name: SAC2
0:
”Alexa, turn on Sony TV”
”Alexa, turn off AC”
”Alexa, turn on Dyson”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can control your home appliance with our product IR extender.

Prerequisites:
- Having at least one IR extender SAC WiFi
- Download our mobile application: SAC2.0
- Setup IR extender via SAC 2.0 and link up with an account (Sign-in)

When you enable this skill, you will be ask to login, please use the account you create at SAC2.0.

If you have problem on setup with our product, here are some videos you can reference.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1cNfqWlhctQ&list=PLf-jIYNh_bS9RxXI4AMDG1n0Lx5caQnnw
